title: message to folders
content: When I downloaded Thunderbird, all the folders from my e-mail account downloaded; but, I could not move a message from the Inbox to a folder. Today, when I opened Thunderbird, all my folders disappeared. Please advise. Thanks, Dan
creator: dan22

title: Email Signature not Appearing on Replies
content:
Hello,

I have settings set in account settings to apply signatures on replies and forwards, however it is not happening. What else can I change?

Thanks, Taylor
creator: taylor19

title: All my address books and received emails
content: Last week my computer was upgraded from Windows 10 to Windows 11. As a result I LOST all my address books and all my received emails. I am 86 and I am involved in many community groups. Now I have NO email contact addresses and recent emails from people. I went to the local Geek Squad for help and I was told all email addresses and all received emails were truly gone. WHY?? Geek Squad person told me it was a Thunderbird support issue. Thank you, David Baur dbaur@provide.net
creator: dbaur1
